name: Gold Rush
description:
Gold Rush - is the simplest 2D game in which you have to overcome various traps and look for treasures.
The essence of this game is very simple. Your main task is to explore a variety of locations and find the right treasures. But don't think that everything will be very easy. On your way there will be a huge variety of traps that you will have to overcome. Think over your every step and every action and this game will definitely not make you bored!

KEY FEATURES:

- Large locations.
- Interesting and simple gameplay.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Unforgettable atmosphere.
